title: Kentucky, The Problem
prompt: A weathered wooden porch overlooking a misty Appalachian valley at dawn, with a worn rocking chair in soft focus in the foreground and a coffee mug on the armrest, capturing the quiet solitude of a rural Kentucky morningâ€”muted greens and grays of mountains, warm golden light breaking through fog, shot with documentary-style clarity and the textural weight of lived experience.
